Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ads
Deprecated: ShowHide
View: ClientSubclassPackageImplementation

Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.ads

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAdvertisingSettings
    The settings which can be used to configure where ad definitions should be downloaded from for each asset marked as supporting adverts.
    IClientSideAdsParserProvider
    This interface enables the application to provide ad server URLs and observers for error reporting to the SDK parser service.
    IServerDAICuePoint
    This represents a cue point within the playback stream which will contain one or more ads.
    IServerDAIPackage
    The ServerDAIPackage represents the sequence of adverts encapsulated within an asset using Dynamic Ad Injection by the server.
    IVideoAd
     
    IVideoAd.IVideoAdCreative
     
    IVideoAdPackage
    The VideoAdPackage represents the full sequence of ads assciated with an asset.
    IVirtuosoAdManager
    Virtuoso Ad Manager provides access via the IAssetManager to advert related functionality.
    IVirtuosoAdParserObserver
    The Ad Parser Observer provides an interface which can be provided with the IClientSideAdsParserProvider to be informed of errors during parsing of Advertising definitions which are associated with assets.
    IVirtuosoAdUrlResolver
    IVirtuosoAdResolver can be supplied to the IClientSideAdsParserProvider to allow custom ad content to be used for specific assets Add an instance of IVirtuosoAdUrlResolver to the list provided by IClientSideAdsParserProvider prior to parsing any asset manifests that have related ad content Multiple IVirtuosoAdUrlResolvers can be provided via the IClientSideAdsParserProvider.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IVirtuosoAdParserError
    VAST Parser Error codes
